main.name: < Hector Palacios />
main.description: Full Stack Developer looking to contribute in a full-stack, front-end or back-end position
main.bio: My name is Hector, and I'm a Computer Engineer and Full Stack Developer. I'm passionate about technology and driven by a need to solve even the most demanding puzzles. I enjoy working with the entire stack with React Js, TypeScript, Express/Node Js, CSS, Boostrap, Material UI, Netlify, AWS, and databases, and I'm always excited to learn new technologies.
main.contactmessage: Get in touch with me to receive further details or have a fun conversation.

resume.skillmessage: MERN Stack, TypeScript, HTML5, .Net, Java, Github, Jira, Crystal Reports. Styling, Audio & Video: CSS, Sass, Bootstrap, Material UI, Figma, Adobe Photoshop/Illustrator/Premiere. Back-End: Express/Node Js. Databases & Data Sources: SQL, RESTful APIs. Deployment, Hosting & V-machines: AWS, Netlify, Heroku, VMWARE, Hyper-V.

work.title: Software Developer
work.description: Participated in a remote Agile team of four developers to build a Kanban Board and Calendar application with the MERN stack and TypeScript. Incorporated API services: Sendinblue email notification and Amazon S3 Bucket.

work.description: Demonstrated leadership for the creation, delivery and execution 50+ projects in the last 6 yrs. Determined the resources required to complete the project and made final decisions on administrative or operational matters.

testimonials.text: Recursively splitting a problem into two or more sub-problems (divide), until these become simple enough to be solved directly (conquer).
'First, solve the problem. Then, write the code.'

'First, think and write the solution out on paper in steps. Then start writing the code. Donâ€™t get complicated in the code and software design first because it will only serve to have to do things several times and waste time.
